column5: Sweet!  I caught a night pike on a jitterbug one time. Bizarre.

Thanks everyone!  It's always great to get a PB...and this was a surprise to me to say the least.  GBayGiant - I remember reading an article on night time pike fishing and being disappointed that it said not to bother.  I've caught 4 nice sized ones at night...all over 32" and over 8lbs.  007 - Let's not get crazy here...this is the first fish I've caught in a while..LOL.  Thanks though!!  I really dont know...LOL.  I just cast and retrieve...most times I hit bottom or weeds....sometimes it pulls back
I still don't get it?  How do you do that.  Are there any diagrams?

Wow Cliff, congrats on your personal best Redfin Pickeral!!! I guess you got that down by the __________ using your favourite ____________ around __:___ o'clock? Gotta go, I think my cell is ringing... nope it's my smokes again. -Brian
woohoo! that night time 11ish report is back  now i can finally sleep well at night ... great catch Cliff, congrats on the PB
Nice toothie     , especially at night.  congrats on the PB..
Awesome !!! what a nice surprise
AINT BEEN AROUND IN ABIT BUT WAY TO GO BRO!!!! NOW YOUR REPORTS ARE KILLIN ME  LOL
Nice Pike Cliff I am yet to beat my PB of 8lbs.That jewlery looks funny on your forhead

Well, after getting thoroughly spanked at Quinte this past weekend, Bly and I went out tonight trying to catch some fish.  With the little rain we got last night we wondered if some Steelies would be hanging around the creek mouths.  We headed out at around 8pm and set up for some bottom fishing with roe.  We saw a few people there last week having some luck fishing that way so we thought we'd give it a try.  After an hour of no action whatsoever, I decided to warm up a little and began to throw a crank bait.  I wasn't paying attention and was talking to Bly when I feel a pretty big hit.  I set the hook late thinking there is no way the fish was still there and I heard the drag engage.  This fish kept splashing at the surface, but it felt all wrong to be a trout....plus I've never had a hit on a crank before for trout.  Anyhow, as it got closer, I realize that I've caught a pretty good sized pike!!  Bly expertly nets the fish and it turned out it beat my old personal best for pike by about a pound.  This one measured in at 36.5 inches and weighed 11 pounds 1 ounce.  Here's the pic....
Nice one Cliff way to go.
Nice one, another big night pike, I guess ofners are putting that myth to rest this year. Looks clean.
Sweet water croc WTG cliff !!!
Nice stuff Cliff !
Nice pike! And in darkness too.. that's kinda rare for pike.
nice pike wtg on your pb  rob

Watch out Cliff's nightly reports are back - PB pike today, PB steelhead tomorrow and a surprise fish the next day..... I can't wait for the next installment.  Congrats on the PB - she's a beauty!  007
Beautiful. That's exactly what I'm after.
nice fish there cliff! good job  kevin
Nice job Cliff, beautiful pike for sure.
What a great catch for this time of year ccmtcanada! Gotta love urban pike!
Nice catch, congrats.
Congrats Very nice pike.
nice one,congrats on the pb

Keep throwing those cranks, in 1 day recently, I caught a pike, salmon and trout on the same crank bait.  Keep it up, cranks can be the way to go when nothing else is doing.  and that is one nice Pike!  Nice going once again.
...........a complete loss for words  How doo's yooo's do it?
Very nice!  Congrats!  Maureen
Excellent Cliff. Always nice to nail a pb. Congrats.
That's awesome Cliff, what a great catch!
Y'all make me sick!!!
Glen....  Nice Pike Cliff.. wtg
real nice looking Pike!
Nice big pike cliff !!!!...congrats on your new PB..  .for pike, great pic too....cheers
Great catch!  Congrats on the PB
